transcript_chunks.text: that's beautiful that's some good stuff right there i don't normally do this i'm not a religious man but i do need to pray for a second because this is dangerous this is a dangerous thing we're going to do and i'm going to pray to our lord and savior uh mr kenny loggins dear baby jesus kenneth logan revving up your engines listening to her howling roar medal under tension begging you to touch and go highway to the danger zone ride into the danger zone out along the edges always where we burn to be the further on the edge the hotter the intensity highway to the danger zone gonna take it right into the danger zone highway to the danger zone right [Music] we love you
